wikipedia_page.main: Brian Marshall (born 20 September 1954 in Bolton on Dearne, West Riding of Yorkshire) is a former professional footballer, who played as a defender for Huddersfield Town and Scunthorpe United.

response: Brian Marshall is an American musician and songwriter.
